attributes.action: change the law to allow child protection services greater powers to remove children into care at any sign of abuse.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Prime Minister 
We the nation are deeply shocked about the plight of baby P 2006-2007
This is truly one of the worst cases of child abuse yet that has happened upon our doorstep. 
For such a barbaric act of child cruelty and murder to occur in this day and age is a deeply embarrassing situation for Britain.
We demand that the law is changed to allow much greater power and authority to Child Protection Services so that this may never happen again. We want to see Child Protection Services intervene and remove a child into protective care immediately if child abuse is suspected but not proven as in this case. We demand that the child be protected until thorough investigations are made. 

We also demand that the social workers and other health and child care workers involved in this case resign from their posts immediately. They failed miserably in their duty to protect this small infant and we demand their resignation in full.

Never again should this ever ever be allowed to happen. 
Gordon Brown we urge you to make those changes so that  Baby P's short and sad tragic life  was not in vain.

Yours sincerely
Lesley Heron
